title.bibl: Forward, July 11, 1919Music in the Spirit of the Spirit of the Socialist Movement. Become a member of the Jewish Socialist Orchestra..

div.bibl: Forward, July 11, 1919Music in the Spirit of the Spirit of the Socialist Movement. Become a member of the Jewish Socialist Orchestra..

body.p: If you can play any instrument, you should become a member of the orchestra and thereby make your life more interesting and more beautiful, and at the same time develop your musical talent.
We meet every Thursday evening in the Educational Alliance, Wood and Washington St.
If you have no instrument, we will assist you in securing one.
